treatment.description: Protonematal flaps narrow, linear, acute up to 2.5 mm, usually entire, sometimes with a short mucronate point. Stem leaves acuminate, sharply pointed.
treatment.phenology: Capsules rare to very rare, mature late summer.
treatment.habitat: Often growing inverted under rock ledges or in crevices, especially in areas of high humidity, sometimes mixed in with other bryophytes;
